prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in on you. How have you been?  
Don’t forget about our meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. Looking forward to it!  
Your package has been delivered! It should be on your porch.  
Can you please send me the report by the end of the day? Thanks!  
Hey, just a reminder that your dentist appointment is on Friday at 10 AM.  
Your bank alert: A deposit of $500 was made to your account today.  
Are we still on for dinner this weekend? Let me know what time works for you!  
Just a quick note that your subscription will renew on the 15th.  
I saw your message! I’ll call you later tonight.  
Congrats on your promotion! Let’s celebrate soon!  
Your OTP for logging in is 123456. Please use it within 10 minutes.  
We’ll need to reschedule our meeting. How does next Wednesday sound?  
Just checking in to see how your job search is going. Any updates?  
Your order for the new phone has been confirmed and will ship soon!  
Reminder: The community meeting is next Thursday at 6 PM at the library.  
Hey! Did you get a chance to look at that document I sent?  
I hope you’re feeling better! Let me know if you need anything.  
Your flight from NYC to LA has been delayed by 2 hours.  
Hey! Can you pick up some groceries on your way home? Thanks!  
I’m running late, but I’ll be there in about 15 minutes.  
Your appointment has been successfully booked for next Monday at 3 PM.  
Just a heads up that the power will be out for maintenance from 1 to 3 PM tomorrow.  
Hey, I finished the book you recommended! Let’s discuss it over coffee.  
Your recent transaction of $45.99 was successful.  
Thanks for helping out with the event last weekend! It went great!  
Can you remind me to call Mom tomorrow? I keep forgetting!  
The webinar you registered for starts at 5 PM tomorrow. Don’t miss it!  
I’m so proud of you! You did an amazing job on your presentation!  
Your password has been successfully reset. Please let us know if you have any issues.  
Are you free to catch up this week? I’d love to hear about your trip!  
Just a quick reminder to pay your rent by the end of the week.  
I received your email and will get back to you shortly.  
Your feedback is valuable to us! Please fill out the survey linked below.  
Hey, can you send me the link to that video we talked about?  
I wanted to let you know that I’ll be out of town from the 10th to the 15th.  
Thanks for your patience! We’ll have the final results ready by Friday.  
Just a reminder that the school play is this Saturday at 7 PM.  
Can you help me with my presentation tomorrow? I could use a second pair of eyes.  
Your car service is scheduled for Thursday at 11 AM.  
I appreciate your prompt response to my last message. It really helped!  
Let’s plan a family get-together sometime next month.  
Your invoice is due next week. Please check your email for the details.  
Hey! Just wanted to say I'm thinking of you. Hope everything is okay!  
Thanks for the invite! I’ll be there with bells on!  
Your fitness class starts at 6:30 PM tonight. Don’t forget your water bottle!  
I’m here if you need to talk. Just send me a message anytime.  
Your account has been successfully verified. Welcome aboard!  
Can you remind me of the deadline for the project? I want to stay on track.  
Looking forward to seeing you at the reunion next month!  
Your feedback on our service is much appreciated! Thank you!
